at_school.speaker: Ann
at_school.en: Hi, Nick. Is this your brother?

at_school.speaker: Nick
at_school.en: Yes. This is Ben. Ben, this is my classmate, Ann.
at_school.zh: 對啊。他是 Ben。Ben，這是我的同學 Ann。

at_school.speaker: Ann
at_school.en: Nice to meet you, too. Are you in junior high school?
at_school.zh: 我也很高興認識你。你是國中生嗎？

at_school.speaker: Ben
at_school.en: No, I'm in elementary school. I'm eleven.
at_school.zh: 不是，我是小學生。我十一歲。

in_the_classroom.speaker: Irene
in_the_classroom.en: Zoe, is that your new pencil case?

in_the_classroom.speaker: Zoe
in_the_classroom.en: Yes, it is. My aunt is a designer. It's her gift.
in_the_classroom.zh: 是的。我的阿姨是設計師。這是她送的禮物。

in_the_classroom.speaker: Irene
in_the_classroom.en: Cool! What does your uncle do?
in_the_classroom.zh: 好酷！你的叔叔是做什麼的？

in_the_classroom.speaker: Zoe
in_the_classroom.en: He takes care of animals. He's a vet.

text.title: In the Classroom
text.en: Zoe has a new pencil case. Her aunt is a designer, and it is a gift from her. Irene likes it very much. Zoe's uncle is a vet, and he takes care of sick animals.
text.zh: Zoe 有一個新的鉛筆盒。她的阿姨是設計師，這是阿姨送的禮物。Irene 很喜歡。Zoe 的叔叔是獸醫，他照顧生病的動物。

reading.title: A Saturday Picnic
reading.en: The Park family has a picnic this Saturday. Nick plays the guitar, Ann takes photos, and Ben flies a kite. Their grandparents sit on a bench and tell stories. In the afternoon, Mr. Park buys ice cream for everyone.
reading.zh: 這個星期六，朴一家去野餐。Nick 彈吉他，Ann 拍照，Ben 放風箏。祖父母坐在長椅上說故事。下午，朴先生買冰淇淋給大家。

examples.en: He is a vet at the animal hospital.
Mr. Park works at a bookstore.
They have a picnic in the park.
They tell stories in the afternoon.
